entries.meaning: The fact or act of surviving; continued existence or life.
examples: His survival in the open ocean was a miracle; he had fully expected to die.

entries.meaning: (as a modifier) Of, relating to or aiding survival.
examples: His survival kit had all the things he needed in the wilderness.

entries.meaning: (sports) The avoidance of relegation or demotion to a lower league or division.
examples: […]  a team that have turned snatching relegation from the jaws of top-flight survival into an art form  […]

entries.meaning: (anthropology) A custom or belief that persists in folklore from earlier times, when the rationale behind it is forgotten.
